title: Infinix Note 11s Free Fire Edition (Haze Green, 128 GB)  (8 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Battery, Adaptor, USB Type-C Cable, TPU Case, Protective Screen Guard, SIM Ejector Pin, Quick Start Guide, Warranty Card, Scratch Card
product_specification.Sound Enhancements: Dual Speakers with DTS Surround Sound
product_specification.Other Display Features: 120 Hz Refresh Rate, 180 Hz Sampling Rate, 91% Screen-to-Body Ratio, 20.5:9 Aspect Ratio, LCD LTPS, 480 nits, 1500:1 Color Contrast Ratio, InCell, Eye Care Mode, NEG Dinorex T2X-1 Glass Protection
product_specification.Operating Frequency: 2G GSM: B2/B3/B5/B8, 3G WCDMA: B1/B5/B8, 4G LTE: B1/B3/B5/B8/B38/B40/B41
product_specification.Primary Camera: 50 MP + 2 MP Depth Lens + 2 MP Macro Lens
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: AI Triple Camera Setup: 50 MP (f/1.6 Aperture) + 2 MP Depth Lens + 2 MP Macro Lens, Quad LED Flash, Camera Features : Super Night, Custom Portrait, AI HDR, AI 3D Beauty, Panorama, Document, AR Shots, Pro Mode, Slo-Mo Video, Time Lapse, Short Video, 2K Video Recording with Bokeh
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 16 MP AI Camera Setup: (f/2.0 Aperture) with Dual LED Flash, Camera Feature: Super Night, AI Portrait, AI 3D Face Beauty, Wide Selfie, AR Shots, Time Lapse, 2K Video Recording with Bokeh
product_specification.Flash: Rear: Quad LED Flash| Front: Dual LED Flash
product_specification.Sensors: Fingerprint Sensor, Ambient Light, G-Sensor, Proximity, Gyroscope, E-Compass
product_specification.Other Features: TUV Rheinland Certified: Low Blue Light (Software Solution) and Safe Fast Charge System, UFS 2.2 Storage, DAR-LINK 2.0 Game Boost Technology, Dual Speakers with DTS Surround Sound, Power Marathon Tech, Video Assistant, Thunderback, Xhide, Theft Alert, Peek Proof, Kids Mode, Xclone, Photo Compressor, 360 Flashlight, Social Turbo, Wi-Fi Share, Smart Gestures, Digital Wellbeing, Dark Theme, Eye Care, Multi-Window, Bike Mode, Game Mode, Smart Panel, AI Gallery, Side Mounted Fingerprint Unlock, 3-in-1 Card Slot
product_specification.Audio Formats: AAC, AAC+, AAC+ Enhanced, OGG Vorbis, WAV,MP3, MIDI
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Handset and 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.Immersive Display: The Note 11S features a 16.75 cm (6.95) screen with an FHD+ display and 91% screen-to-body ratio so you can enjoy immersive visuals. Also, the phone features an LTPS LCD screen with 480 NITS brightness, 1500:1 Color Contrast Ratio, and 20.5:9 aspect ratio so that you can enjoy vibrant and clear visuals while playing games and streaming movies.
product_description.120 Hz Smooth display: You can enjoy smooth browsing and seamless scrolling through the screen, thanks to the 120 Hz refresh rate. This mobile phone comes with a 180 Hz touch sampling rate that increases the screen responsiveness, thus providing you with an enhanced gaming experience.
product_description.Stellar Performance: This mobile phone is powered by an Helio G96 Octa-core processor with 12 nm FinFET, 2.05 GHz CPU frequency, that delivers fast graphics rendering performance, thus making your gaming experience a realistic one. And, this mobile comes with the Dar-link 2.0 Game Boost Technology so that you can avail enhanced image stability free of screen tearing/stuttering while playing an intense gaming session.
product_description.8 GB of LPDDR4X RAM: Thanks to the built-in 128 GB of storage capacity, you can have enough space to store your favourite photos, videos, and more on your mobile phone. You can also enjoy fast streaming of videos, movies, and TV shows, thanks to the UFS2.2 type storage. And, with up to 8 GB of LPDDR4X RAM on this phone, you can seamlessly and quickly shuffle between multiple apps.
product_description.Linear Motor: This mobile phone comes with a haptic feedback Linear motor so that you can take delight in interactive and realistic gaming every time. Also, this phone features a unique supercool system with 3D 6-layer graphene films on the back so that you can enjoy long gaming sessions without worrying about your device heating up.
product_description.Power Packed Battery: You don't have to worry about your battery running out, thanks to the powerful 5000 mAh battery along with Power Marathon Technology on this phone. As a result, you can enjoy up to 24 hrs of Video playback, 158 hrs of Music playback, 64 days of standby time, and more with a single full charge. Also, it comes with a 33 W fast charger with a USB Type-C cable so that you can effortlessly charge your phone using the cable.
product_description.50 MP Wide Aperture Camera: This phone is equipped with a 50 MP wide aperture AI triple rear camera so that you can capture high-resolution pictures every time. Also, it comes with a 50 MP primary lens (f1.6 wide aperture), 2 MP depth sensor, and 2 MP macro lens, along with Quad-LED flash that will help you to capture bright and clear pictures wherever you go. Also, this mobile phone comes with additional features such as super Night mode, short Video, document mode so that you can capture stunning photos under any light and from any angle. You can enjoy shooting high-end videos on your phone, thanks to the 2K high resolution video capture
product_description.16 MP In-display selfie: This phone comes with a 16 MP AI In-display selfie, f/2.0 aperture, and a dedicated Dual LED flash to add a shine to your sharp and vivid selfies. Also, enjoy the features such as AI Portrait, Super Night Mode, Wide Selfie, 3D Face Beauty mode to further enhance your selfies. Thanks to the 2K high resolution video feature, you can capture high-resolution video with your mobile camera.
product_description.Elegant Design: This mobile phone features a frost design so that you can enjoy smudge-free and finger-proof usage on this phone every day. Also, this phone is equipped with the NEG Dinorex T2X-1 Glass Protection feature to offer durability. And, thanks to the Cinematic Dual Speakers, along with DTS Surround sound, you can enjoy immersive sound while streaming videos or playing games.
product_description.Easy Multi-functional Fingerprint Access: You can unlock your phone with just a tap of your finger, thanks to the side-mounted multi-functional fingerprint sensor. Also, you can tap your fingerprint sensor to dismiss the alarm and answer calls. Moreover, you can jumpstart your favourite apps by synchronising them with different fingers. Also, you can safely and quickly unlock your phone in less than a second thanks to the Face unlock feature.
product_description.XOS 10 on Android 11: Intensify your user experience with the XOS 10 powered by the Android 11 operating system on this mobile phone. As a result, you can enjoy the benefits of additional features, such as Ultratouch, Thunderback, Secure Card, Theft Alert, Xhide, Xclone, Video Assistant, Wi-Fi share, and more.

SUPERB WORK FROM INFINIX TEAM... GOOD ALLROUNDER PHONE INFINIX NOTE 11S FREE FIRE Edition. ❤

Best phone considering the price. 120 hz screen, dual speakers, 33w fast charging with charger, good processor, 50MP camera, 8gb ram, ufs storage, and not chinese. Undoubtedly these features make this best in its category.

Dont think much
I am using these phone since last many weeks and these phone is a BEAST
the phone comes with many PROS
* OUTSTANDING BATTERY WITH LEGIT CHARGING SPEED
* CAN PLAY GAMES FOR HOURS
* SOUND QUALITY IS JUST TOO GOOD
* THE FREE FIRE EDITION COVER GIVES YOUR PHONE A REAL GOOD LOOK WITH GRRAT HANDLE
* TOO BIG DISPLAY IS GREAT FOR MOVIES
* HUGE PHONE BUT STILL NOT THAT HEAVY

Some CONS too
* Not that good camera but 50M mode is good
* Cant use with single hand but a single hand mode is given which still is good
* In terms of display not that bad but if we had amoled then it can be 10/10

Overall i must say if you need something powerful in these budget no one can be compared with these Beast

INFINIX, Loved the device❤️

The OS still need to be optimised

Bought this phone with lot of expectations but it's not worth it.
Pros -
1. Good battery life
2. Fast charging.
3. Okay camera

Cons -
1. I THOUGH BIGGER DISPLAY IS BIGGER FUN but it proved me wrong. It's quite uncomfortable actually.
2. Cannot perform Heavy duty (Crashes and apps stops working, keeps disconnecting from wifi automatically and other devices doesn't do that
3. Because graphics is not that good. Compared to Realme 8 and redmi note 8 pro, those phone never hanged while doing something. And I have not even used 3gb ram out of 8.

I would say don't go for it, it's not better than Realme and Redmi
